thread.title: Middlesbrough to assess the fitness of Albert Adomah and Stuani ahead of Fulham date
thread.title_full: Middlesbrough to assess the fitness of Albert Adomah and Stuani ahead of Fulham date

title: Middlesbrough to assess the fitness of Albert Adomah and Stuani ahead of Fulham date
text:
Sports News | 15 October 2015 23:25 CET Middlesbrough to assess the fitness of Albert Adomah and Stuani ahead of Fulham date - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Aitor Karanka will assess the mental state and fitness of three of his key men before finalising his Middlesbrough team for Saturday's visit of Fulham. 
The Boro boss knows the game with the Cottagers marks the start of another hectic run of seven matches inside 22 days so the international fortnight has been important to his side's recovery process. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
